content: the èveryday bow was created the bow starts at a single point and grows with increases knit flat in garter stitch the body has a subtle tilt giving it a playful interesting shape decreases are worked at the opposite end keeping the points aligned the piece is finished with a crochet edge it s a small fun project that s quick to knit and perfect for a hair elastic bag or anywhere you like **finished size** length flat side to side approximately 28″ / 71 cm width flat top to bottom varies slightly depending on gauge and yarn **gauge** measured over garter stitch varies depending on yarn and needle choice **yarn** worsted weight yarn 40 g / 75 85 m for main color optional contrast color 5 g / 5 10 m **materials** 6 mm / us 10 knitting needles crochet hook no 3 weaving needle 1 stitch marker **difficulty** ★☆☆☆☆- perfect for beginners
